review: I LOVE the Amazon Fire TV Stick! So simple to set up and get going and it works beautifully! Because of where my TV is located in the house I was unable to get any local reception and the game box I was previously using to stream Netflix was no longer working consistently so I was out of luck when it came to watching movies or shows... and now it's all back! No buffering, no error messages, no fuzzy picture. Thank You!
